description:
Looking for a quiet, modern and spacious room not too far from the City? Look no further! Located mere blocks away from FDR Boardwalk and Beach & Miller Field; with easy access to buses going to Staten Island Ferry and express buses to downtown & midtown NYC. 
Located on the ground level, studio offers separate entrance; queen size bed, a pull out couch & love seat. Plenty of storage; dining nook, coffeemaker, toaster, microwave, TV and fireplace to make you feel right at home.

Very spacious ground floor studio - complete with dining nook, full bathroom (shower) as well as 2 couches and queen size bed.

Studio has separate entrance to the side of the house - providing private ease of access.

Available by phone or text throughout the day

Located mere blocks away from FDR Boardwalk & Beach and right next to Miller Field, the area is perfect for those looking to indulge in city views as well as families looking for a perfect place to provide kids with things to do.

Local bus to Staten Island Ferry (S51) few blocks away as well as express buses to Manhattan (X3, X4, X5, X7, X8). 

Staten Island Railroad located 1 mile away.
name: New Modern Private Studio in New York
review: It was a great stay host gave me the key and said fell free to let me know if there's anything you need in the unit. The unit was clean, and up to date the shower is the best. Over all great experience when ever o return to Staten Island to coat family I will stay there.
